name: RelatedTimes
description:
Hey, here comes "RelatedTimes" ! My little participation to the #SoloCodeJam of January 2020.

It's just a draft that I'll update if I'm motivated. It's a very nice way to learn Godot.

Concepts : overcoming obstacles and getting rid of enemies by navigating between different timelines.

Todo : 

  • Too many things to list.

Controls :

  • Gamepad :
    • Moving character with left joystick
    • Moving camera with right jostick
    • Hold A (X-Box) to run
    • Press B (X-Box) to jump
    • Press R2 (X-Box) to jump into the past
    • Press L2 (X-Box) to jump into the futur
    • Press Menu (X-Box) for options
  • Keyboard:
    • Moving character with ZQSD
    • Moving camera with mouse
    • Hold Shift to run
    • Press Space to jump
    • Press A to jump into the past
    • Press E to jump into the futur
    • Press Esc for options

Thanks to GDQuest for the character : Open Source 3d character and character controller for the Godot game engine .
And for the StateMachine course .
